responses: Hello,i am VirtualAditi the bot who will help understand Aditi better
I can tell you about Aditi's developed projects or hobbies
I can help you understand Aditi's background and projects

patterns: Give me a list of aditi's projects
responses: Aditi has always tried to self learn via building projects across different domains. In Barclays she has worked on 'Test Env Monitor' , 'AID Pilot', 'GOLF' to name a few. Apart from that she has other projects like 'Lyricsmatch', 'StockMarket Prediction' , 'Help Alzhemier', 'Url Shortner App'. To know more in detail ask me about these projects individually.

patterns: tell me in detail about aditi
responses: Aditi has received her BE from University of Mumbai and is doing her Masters from University of Florida. Her 3 years experience in Barclays as a developer have shaped her better technically and helped her understand customer needs.She believes that Change and Learning are the two constants in life. Thus she thrives hard to learn and push her boundaries. Ask me about her projects to know more.

patterns: I want to know about AID PILOT
describe in detail about AID PILOT
responses: Analytically Intelligent Dashboard Pilot would take the activity log of the user on Barclays platforms into consideration to help the bank understand the possible journeys through the bankâ€™s channels. The work helped her in identifying the root cause associated with these journey failures and its difference to Bot performed journeys so that they could be further analyzed to give actionable insights to the stakeholders.

patterns: tell me in detail about golf
responses: GOLF is Global Online Form and Aditi has worked  on implementing Account Closure journey in existing Submit IT- Global Online Forms(GOLF) to cater to open accounts and international numbers. Also Worked on fixing Veracode vulnerabilities and improving Sonar Unit Test Coverage for various GOLF in Barclays.

patterns: tell me in detail about Lyrics match
responses: Aditi developed an app in Android Studio with Speech-to-Text feature to search for a song and play it, according to the lyrics matched with the user input. It had helped her bagged first prize in Intra Level National Project Showcase in College. More over inspired her to explore ML/AI field.

patterns: I want to know about test env monitor
tell me about Test env Monitor
describe in detail about test env monitor
responses: It is  a monitoring and alerting solution for test environments across the bank. The solution helped developers get pristine information about any environmental change that may impact the delivery of a product to the end user. In the event of a bad environment, created tool would inform the developers and project owners via email. This helped in saving manual labour, time, money, and resources. The project helped her learn as well as implement Groovy, Spring-boot, Angular, Tableau, and SoapUI framework and tools.

patterns: tell me in detail about stock market prediction
responses: Project that predicts opening stock prices for Amazon and Netflix. Also it forecast opening stock prices for next 20 days. Link https://github.com/adshre/End2EndProjects_StockPricePrediction.

patterns: tell me in detail about help alzheimer
responses: Project that contains sub project that would help Alzhemier patients like Daily reminders, etc . Link https://github.com/adshre/End2EndProjects_Alzheimer.

patterns: tell me in detail about shorting of url
responses: It is a flask application that helps to shorten Urls given as input and also keep a count of number of visits done for these urls.Link https://github.com/adshre/Practice_Projects/tree/main/UrlShortnerUsingFlask.

patterns: tell me in detail about some other projects than these
responses: You can check her git hub profile for further projects under Practice_Projects Repo and more. Link to her github profile is https://github.com/adshre.

patterns: what does aditi do in free time?
I want to know about her hobbies
tell in detail about her hobbies
responses: Aditi likes to read and paint. She loves reading articles , blogs both technical and fictional. Also she has been recognized for her art work . Kay Kay Menon had Liked her art work of his.
